questions.question: What is the overall textual layout and organization of the presented information on the product?

What is the most prominent heading or title element displayed in the upper left-hand corner?
What descriptive word follows 'Nutrition' in the main title, immediately below it?
What is the dominant color used for the text throughout this nutritional information?
What is the visual style or typeface used for the main 'Nutrition Facts' title?
What unit of measurement is consistently used for the 'Serving Size' information?
What common nutritional component is listed last in the left-hand column of values?
What nutritional element is specified in the bottom left corner of the informational block?
What is the visual structure of the values in the two main columns—rows or columns?
What is the overall background color or shade of this nutritional label?
What type of information is presented in the secondary, smaller text block located to the right?
What is the font style primarily used for the numeric values and percentages?
What is the visual texture of the text itself—smooth or rough?
Excluding the main heading, what is the most frequently used textual element?
